en.title: Secure Notes
en.text_subtitle_0: Your notes are protected with encryption
en.text_info_text_1: Create a strong password to protect your notes
en.text_info_text_4: Enter your password to access your notes
en.text_settings_description_9: After the specified time of inactivity, the app will automatically lock
en.text_settings_description_11: Delete all notes and reset the app
